name: Growth Hormone Foundation Stack (Ordered Alternative)
mechanism: Mod GRF 1-29 (GHRH analogue without DAC) + Ipamorelin (GHS) creates synergistic GH release with natural pulsing. Similar to Tesamorelin+Ipamorelin but with shorter half-life GHRH component

ipamorelin.timing: Same timing as Mod GRF (stack together)

cycling: Can run continuously or cycle 5 days on, 2 days off
synergy_notes: The combination creates physiological GH pulses. Mod GRF provides GHRH signal while Ipamorelin amplifies release via ghrelin pathway. No DAC means natural pulsing vs continuous elevation
considerations: More frequent dosing than Tesamorelin (due to shorter half-life)
